name: Michael L. Brown
description:
Michael L. Brown ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Michael L. Brown in mp3 format.  Michael L. Brown is the founder and president of FIRE School of Ministry in Concord, North Carolina, director of the Coalition of Conscience, and host of the daily, nationally, syndicated talk radio show, The Line of Fire, as well as the host of the Jewish-outreach, documentary TV series, Think It Thru, which airs internationally on the INI network. He became a believer in Jesus 1971 as a sixteen year-old, heroin-shooting, LSD-using Jewish rock drummer. Since then, he has preached throughout America and around the world, bringing a message of repentance, revival, reformation, and cultural revolution.
Dr. Brown is a national and international speaker on themes of spiritual renewal and cultural reformation, and he has debated Jewish rabbis, agnostic professors, and gay activists on radio, TV, and college campuses. He is widely considered to be the world's foremost Messianic Jewish apologist. He and his wife Nancy, who is also a Jewish believer in Jesus, have been married since 1976. They have two daughters and four grandchildren.

audio_sermons.title: A Baptism of Tears for Israel
audio_sermons.description: Michael Brown delivers a piercing and burdening message calling the body of Christ to take the eternal reality of the unsaved seriously and allow God to grieve us for the salvation of the lost. By emphasizing Paul’s burden and heart wrenching desire for Israel, Dr. Brown shares both the closeness and hardness of Israel and reveals the need for a broken heart over all men.

audio_sermons.title: A Call To Prayer
audio_sermons.description: As the title suggests Michael Brown gives an earnest call to prayer which inspires zeal and identifies godly character with a life of prayer. There is a needed renewed call for prayer in our day.

audio_sermons.title: Acharit: The Final End
audio_sermons.description: Using an emphasis on the Hebrew word Aharit, Michael Brown delivers a piercing call to holiness from the word of God which disturbs the conscience and convicts the heart. God speaks an uncompromisingly strong, life-saving call to hold on for the final result of sin is personal destruction and ruin, which singles out the individual personally and reminds them that they must cling to Jesus or fall away.

audio_sermons.title: All Israel Shall Be Saved
audio_sermons.description: This message is a passionate call to intercede for Israel with a persuasive explanation of their place in scripture, the end times and in God’s heart. Dr. Brown clearly denies replacement theology, but not with theological arguments but with a scriptural revelation of God’s relationship with His chosen people and His heart for those who are so close and yet so far from His grace.

audio_sermons.title: Are You Backsliding? (Part 1)
audio_sermons.description: This is the first hour of a two hour message given at the Brownsville Revival, which probes the hearts of those at the Revival and gives a desperate call not to be satisfied with manifestations of God’s presence, but to press on for personal, corporate and national transformation. This first hour features many stories of revival history showing that true revival completely turns masses upside down.

audio_sermons.title: Are you Afraid of Revival?
audio_sermons.description: Michael Brown delivers a message and teaching that examines the heart, illuminating the secret motivations that inhibit the Spirit’s reviving work and free reign in our lives. He assesses manifestations and the nature of the Spirit’s work to transform lives with great wisdom, emphasizing repentance and regeneration even while encouraging abandon to the work of the Spirit and a passionate response to God.

audio_sermons.title: Called to Die
audio_sermons.description: Michael Brown encourages a radical following of Jesus that mortifies the flesh, denies the self and sacrifices everything to reach the world and burn for Christ. It’s a powerful call to suffer for the sake of taking up the cross to be a part of Christ reaching the world.

audio_sermons.title: Confronting the Homosexual Agenda
audio_sermons.description: Dr. Brown gives a strong encouragement to be light and salt in the world, revolutionizing society and impacting the nature of our culture. He gives frightening facts about the progressing homosexual revolution, including its aims and successes while maintaining a compassionate heart for their lives.

audio_sermons.title: Consumers or Disciples?
audio_sermons.description: Illuminating Christ’s all encompassing, uncompromising call to discipleship and consecration, Michael Brown contrasts the current Christian consumer mentality with the standards Jesus teaches. He calls for the utter rejection of anything outside of Christ and emphasizes the priesthood of the body in contrast with the clergy vs. leity view that is so commonly held today.
